title: Claude Code Environment Variables Schema
description: JSON Schema for Claude Code environment variables. Based on: monitoring-usage, setup, amazon-bedrock, google-vertex-ai, mcp, settings

ANTHROPIC_API_KEY.description: API key sent as X-Api-Key header to Anthropic API

ANTHROPIC_AUTH_TOKEN.description: Custom authentication token sent with Bearer prefix

ANTHROPIC_CUSTOM_HEADERS.description: Custom headers in 'Name: Value' format, one per line

AWS_BEARER_TOKEN_BEDROCK.description: Bearer token for Amazon Bedrock API authentication

ANTHROPIC_MODEL.description: Custom model name to use for sessions

ANTHROPIC_SMALL_FAST_MODEL.description: Haiku-class model name for background tasks

ANTHROPIC_SMALL_FAST_MODEL_AWS_REGION.description: AWS region for small/fast model when using Bedrock

BASH_DEFAULT_TIMEOUT_MS.description: Default timeout for Bash commands in milliseconds

BASH_MAX_TIMEOUT_MS.description: Maximum allowed timeout for Bash commands in milliseconds

BASH_MAX_OUTPUT_LENGTH.description: Maximum number of characters in Bash command output

CLAUDE_BASH_MAINTAIN_PROJECT_WORKING_DIR.description: Return to original working directory after each Bash command (1/true to enable)

CLAUDE_CODE_MAX_OUTPUT_TOKENS.description: Maximum output tokens for model responses

CLAUDE_CODE_USE_BEDROCK.description: Use Amazon Bedrock instead of direct Anthropic API (1/true to enable)

CLAUDE_CODE_USE_VERTEX.description: Use Google Vertex AI instead of direct Anthropic API (1/true to enable)

CLAUDE_CODE_SKIP_BEDROCK_AUTH.description: Skip Bedrock authentication (for pre-authenticated environments) (1/true to enable)

CLAUDE_CODE_SKIP_VERTEX_AUTH.description: Skip Vertex AI authentication (for pre-authenticated environments) (1/true to enable)

CLAUDE_CODE_API_KEY_HELPER_TTL_MS.description: Credential refresh interval in milliseconds (default: 5 minutes)

CLAUDE_CODE_IDE_SKIP_AUTO_INSTALL.description: Skip automatic IDE extension installation (1/true to enable)

CLAUDE_CODE_DISABLE_NONESSENTIAL_TRAFFIC.description: Disable non-essential network traffic (analytics, telemetry) (1/true to enable)

CLAUDE_CODE_DISABLE_TERMINAL_TITLE.description: Disable automatic terminal title updates (1/true to enable)

DISABLE_COST_WARNINGS.description: Disable cost warning messages (1/true to enable)

DISABLE_ERROR_REPORTING.description: Disable Sentry error reporting (1/true to enable)

DISABLE_NON_ESSENTIAL_MODEL_CALLS.description: Disable non-critical model calls (summaries, suggestions) (1/true to enable)

MCP_TIMEOUT.description: MCP server startup timeout in milliseconds

MCP_TOOL_TIMEOUT.description: MCP tool execution timeout in milliseconds

MAX_MCP_OUTPUT_TOKENS.description: Maximum tokens for MCP tool responses

VERTEX_REGION_CLAUDE_3_5_HAIKU.description: Vertex AI region for Claude 3.5 Haiku model

VERTEX_REGION_CLAUDE_3_5_SONNET.description: Vertex AI region for Claude 3.5 Sonnet model

VERTEX_REGION_CLAUDE_3_7_SONNET.description: Vertex AI region for Claude 3.7 Sonnet model

VERTEX_REGION_CLAUDE_4_0_OPUS.description: Vertex AI region for Claude 4.0 Opus model

VERTEX_REGION_CLAUDE_4_0_SONNET.description: Vertex AI region for Claude 4.0 Sonnet model

OTEL_EXPORTER_OTLP_METRICS_CLIENT_KEY.description: Path to client key file for mTLS authentication for metrics

OTEL_EXPORTER_OTLP_METRICS_CLIENT_CERTIF.description: Path to client certificate file for mTLS authentication for metrics
